device.overview: Apple's 2025 powerhouse, introducing the A19 Pro chip and a new 'Air' thin-profile design philosophy.

specs.label: Display
specs.description: Features ProMotion technology with a 120Hz refresh rate and the new ultra-durable Ceramic Shield.

specs.label: Camera
specs.description: Fully upgraded 48MP sensors across all lenses—Wide, Ultrawide, and Telephoto—for consistent detail.

specs.label: Battery
specs.description: Enhanced energy efficiency providing up to 29 hours of video playback.

specs.label: RAM
specs.description: Increased memory capacity to support the latest Apple Intelligence features and multitasking.

specs.label: Storage
specs.description: Standard high-speed NVMe storage, ideal for ProRes video recording.
